title: Compression Arch Sleeves - Plantar Fasciitis Braces / Sleeves (2 Pairs Black) , Foot Care, Heel Spurs, Feet Pain, Flat Arches .
features: COMFORTABLY SUPPORTS THE ARCHES - provides compression to your arch and absorbs shock, which facilitates blood circulation and thus provides pain relief .

EFFECTIVE ----The effective and breathable design of this therapy wrap provides great compression that helps to relieve pain & discomfort related to plantar fasciitis, achiles , edema, stress fracture, tendon, metatarsal, heel pain symptoms.
description: 1. Breathable Material. 2. Arch Pain,Plantar Fasciitis, Heel Pain or Spurs,Bone Spur,Plantar Wart,Metatarsal pain. 3. Helps to relieve pain & discomfort related to plantar fasciitis, achiles , edema, stress fracture, tendon, metatarsal, heel pain symptoms.  6.It can be Hand washable, Reusable when it is dirty after you used for many days.  ❤

Great for flat feet, weak arches, arch caring, sports protection etc. ❤

To keep the item in good condition and good shape, please get it washed by hand instead of washing machine.Hand wash the gel sleeves in warm water (<86℉) with mild soap and air dry. Don't dry the gel sleeve directly under sun. Sprinkle the gel with talcum powder before reusing.
